column2: ENGLISH
Damaged Reputation
Spread False Rumors
The Gates have been opened, making a siege much easier.
You've come across a person of remarkable charm and cunning.

My first book ever, A Tale of Intrigue and Reconnaissance, is a story about a spy and is now on sale(link in the mod description if you're interested). In honor of its release, I've created a number of spy mechanics.
Let me use these mechanics.
Not interested in these mechanics.
Hmm, you'd make an excellent spy.
The spy has successfully sneaked inside the walls and now awaits your orders..
Send the signal, I want in that castle!
No, it's not needed.
The spy was successful, the gates are now open, this will make the sige much easier.
The spy failed to raise the gate and died in the attempt..
Excellent, forward!
Damn...
The spy comes to you with a proposal, "My lord, I believe I can spread a rumor that will damage the reputation of someone in your way."
Hmm, I can use this against my liege, surely that would clear my path.
My rival has far too much support, this would do wonders for me.
This will make my claim much easier to press.
No I don't need to use such tactics.
There's a terrible rumor about [TOI_target.GetFirstName] spreading through the realm
Such nonsense, [TOI_target.GetFirstName] would never...
Bah, just more reason to hate [TOI_target.GetFirstName].
[TOI_target.GetFirstName] did what??.
There's a terrible rumor about you spreading through the realm
No one will believe it, right?
